About Esther Johnson

Esther L. Johnson
RN, BSN, PHN
Holistic Nurse

Esther Johnson has over thirty five years experience as a Registered Nurse and practices using a holistic philosophy and integrative modalities in treating and working with her clients. Certified as a Public Health Nurse, she holds additional certifications in Acutonics, Aromatherapy, HIV/AIDS education, Integrative Imagery, Medical Hypnotherapy and Energy Work. Esther’s role as a Hospice nurse for many years has provided her tools for assisting those who are experiencing grief and loss as well as serving as a midwife for those with a limited life expectancy on their life’s journey.

Esther’s current professional roles include educating and training people to live happier and healthier lives as a Wellness Educator, Consultant & Coach. She focuses on teaching self care tools for improving health through lifestyle changes, diet, exercise, stress management and learning how to manage pain and symptoms of chronic conditions. Her specialty areas and healing treatments include Acupressure, Aromatherapy, Energy Healing, Acutonics & Sound Healing.

As a Health and Wellness Consultant Esther promotes incorporating a healthy lifestyle by sharing Plexus Products which contain proven ingredients that address key areas of vitality and optimal health maintenance. Plexus Products promote healthy blood sugars, balance lipid levels, promote heart health, brain health, assist in managing discomfort and when used as directed support healthy weight loss.

Esther’s extensive experience as Integrative Therapies Program Director for Pathways Home Health & Hospice, the largest not for profit Home Care & Hospice in the San Francisco Bay area, has allowed her to become an expert in her field. As a Certified Hospice & Palliative Care nurse she created, developed and directed the Integrative Therapies program, specializing in non pharmacologic interventions for pain and symptom management. Esther served as an adjunct faculty member at colleges and universities in the San Francisco Bay area, teaching with “Beyond Ordinary Nursing”, whose certification program in Imagery has been endorsed by the American Holistic Nurse Association. Esther has authored professional articles for a number of nursing journals and has contributed to several books and on-line educational programs profiling case studies from her work with patients and clients using Acupressure, Aromatherapy, Hypnotherapy, Imagery, Acutonics and Sound Healing.

As a national and international speaker, Esther has presented professionally for the California Hospice Foundation, the National Association of Home Care and Hospice, the American Holistic Nurse Association, the American Society of Aging and the Australian College of Holistic Nurses in Brisbane, Australia.
